name: BIMSY'S BOUNTY
description:
Help Bimsy collect vegetables by throwing them high up in the air, splatting away pesky flies in the process! A four-season head-bopping veg-em-up made in 2 days for LOWREZJAM2022.

CONTROLS
Arrows/AD: Move
Up/W: Pull
Z/N: Water
X/M: Punch
Esc/P: Pause

CREDITSZizou: Art + Code
Prutte: Music
Ayekerik: Thumbnail art
